item.title: vim使用进阶常用操作
item.description: vim使用进阶常用操作 # 文件打开退出 # open and edit files has several modes as following: vim filename: open this file vim +n filename: open file and position cursor at line n, `n is a number vim + filename: open this file and position your cursor at last line vim +/pattern filename: open file and position at the first match of pattern vim -r filename: open file and recover from swapfile, swapfile on big RAM is unnecessary, so we can disabled it vim -R filename: open file in mode read-only providing you have edited the file,if you press:
